item.title: Moly Liping Xie
item.description: Education Ph.D, Modern Chinese Political ThoughtSept. 2018 - June 2022 Nanjing University, Nanjing, China Major: Political Theory Dissertation: “People” Before the Popular Sovereignty: Conceptual Transition Period Revisited in Early Modern China Master, Modern Chinese Political ThoughtSept. 2015 - July 2018 South China Normal University, Guangzhou, China Major: Political Theory Dissertation: the Concepts of People in Great Unity Thought by Kang You-wei Bachelor, Modern Chinese Political ThoughtSept. 2011 - July 2015 South China Normal University, Guangzhou, China Major: Political and Ideological Education
